hero.subtitulo: MiGuru helps you generate complete, structured and engaging courses in minutes with the power of AI.

beneficios.iaTexto: Enter your course topic and let MiGuru build the structure, lessons, videos and quizzes in seconds.
beneficios.exportarTexto: Export to your LMS or integrate with platforms like Moodle, Notion or Teachable.
beneficios.personalizarTexto: Refine the generated content, add media, and scale your courses for any audience.
